data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 25,373 believers in Sankuru against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sankuru, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sankuru, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
Spirit, guide the 25,373 believers in the state of Sankuru into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Sankuru. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Sankuru, Democratic Republic of the Congo into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Sankuru to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Sankuru, Democratic Republic of the Congo not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.focus_label: Sankuru, Democratic Republic of the Congo
